SECTION.condition: TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURN_LINE AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURN_TYPE AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.NEGATIVE_LINE_ITEM_FLAG

!TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURNED AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_CHANGE AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.POS_ITEM_ID,NULL) AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_WITH_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_NON_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETAIL_PRICE_MODIFIER.AMOUNT != 0

!TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURNED AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_CHANGE AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.POS_ITEM_ID,NULL) AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_WITH_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_NON_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETAIL_PRICE_MODIFIER.AMOUNT != 0 AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETAIL_PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)

TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_CHANGE AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.POS_ITEM_ID,NULL) AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_WITH_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_NON_TRIGGERS AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETAIL_PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)

TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURNED AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_CHANGE AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.POS_ITEM_ID,NULL) AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_WITH_TRIGGERS AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.MANUAL_PRICE_OVERRIDE_NON_TRIGGERS AND !Equals(TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETAIL_PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)

!TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.PRICE_MODIFICATION AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURNED AND !TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND (TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MONEY_DISCOUNT AND TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MANUAL_DISCOUNT) AND !Equals(TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)

!TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.PRICE_MODIFICATION AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.VOID_FLAG AND (TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MONEY_DISCOUNT AND TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MANUAL_DISCOUNT) AND !Equals(TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)

!TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.PRICE_MODIFICATION AND TS.SALE_RETURN_LINE_ITEM.RETURNED AND (TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MONEY_DISCOUNT AND TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.MANUAL_DISCOUNT) AND !Equals(TS.PRICE_MODIFIER.REASON_DESCRIPTION,null)
